sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO OE1TNDOC ( DOCUMENT_ID , PROCS_STEP_DV , DOCUMENT_SE , DOCUMENT_NM , DOCUMENT_DC , ATCH_FILE_ID , FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , DOC_NO) VALUES ( #documentId# , #procsStepDv# , #documentSe# , #documentNm# , #documentDc# , #atchFileId# , now() , #frstRegisterId# , 1)

INSERT INTO OE1TNDOC ( DOCUMENT_ID , PROCS_STEP_DV , DOCUMENT_SE , DOCUMENT_NM , DOCUMENT_DC , ATCH_FILE_ID , FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , DOC_NO , CHGHY) VALUES ( #documentId# , (SELECT * FROM (SELECT PROCS_STEP_DV FROM OE1TNDOC WHERE DOCUMENT_ID = #documentId# GROUP BY PROCS_STEP_DV) C) , (SELECT * FROM (SELECT DOCUMENT_SE FROM OE1TNDOC WHERE DOCUMENT_ID = #documentId# GROUP BY DOCUMENT_SE) D) , #documentNm# , #documentDc# , #atchFileId# , now() , #frstRegisterId# , (SELECT * FROM (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(DOC_NO), 0)+1 FROM OE1TNDOC WHERE DOCUMENT_ID = #documentId#) E) , #chghy# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.DOCUMENT_ID , TRIM(A.PROCS_STEP_DV) AS PROCS_STEP_DV , TRIM(A.DOCUMENT_SE) AS DOCUMENT_SE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1011' AND CODE = TRIM(A.PROCS_STEP_DV) ) AS PROCS_STEP_DV_NAME , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1010' AND CODE = TRIM(A.DOCUMENT_SE)) AS DOCUMENT_SE_NAME , A.DOCUMENT_NM , A.DOCUMENT_DC , IFNULL(A.RDCNT,0) AS RDCNT , (SELECT MAX(ATCH_FILE_ID) FROM OE1TNFILEDETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = A.ATCH_FILE_ID) AS ATCH_FILE_ID , date_format(A.FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , (SELECT MBER_NM FROM OE1TNUSERINFO WHERE MBER_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID)AS FRST_REGISTER_NAME , date_format(A.LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , (SELECT MBER_NM FROM OE1TNUSERINFO WHERE MBER_ID = A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID)AS LAST_UPDUSR_NAME , A.DOC_NO , A.CHGHY FROM OE1TNDOC A WHERE A.DOCUMENT_ID = #documentId# AND A.DOC_NO = #docNo#

SELECT DOCUMENT_ID , PROCS_STEP_DV_NAME , DOCUMENT_SE_NAME , DOCUMENT_NM , MAX(FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM) AS FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM , MAX(FRST_REGISTER_NAME) AS FRST_REGISTER_NAME , MAX(DOC_NO) DOC_NO FROM ( SELECT A.DOCUMENT_ID , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1011' AND CODE = TRIM(A.PROCS_STEP_DV) ) AS PROCS_STEP_DV_NAME , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1010' AND CODE = TRIM(A.DOCUMENT_SE)) AS DOCUMENT_SE_NAME , A.DOCUMENT_NM , date_format(A.FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM , (SELECT MBER_NM FROM OE1TNUSERINFO WHERE MBER_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID) AS FRST_REGISTER_NAME , DOC_NO FROM OE1TNDOC A WHERE 1=1
TRIM(A.DOCUMENT_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',TRIM(#searchKeyword#),'%')
TRIM(A.DOCUMENT_DC) LIKE CONCAT('%',TRIM(#searchKeyword#),'%')
TRIM(A.PROCS_STEP_DV) = TRIM(#searchProcsStepDv#)
TRIM(A.DOCUMENT_SE) = TRIM(#searchDocumentSe#)
) OE1TNDOC GROUP BY DOCUMENT_ID, PROCS_STEP_DV_NAME, DOCUMENT_SE_NAME, DOCUMENT_NM ORDER BY DOCUMENT_ID DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE OE1TNDOC SET RDCNT = IFNULL(RDCNT,0) + 1 WHERE DOCUMENT_ID = #documentId# AND DOC_NO = #docNo#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT DOCUMENT_ID FROM OE1TNDOC WHERE 1=1
TRIM(DOCUMENT_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',TRIM(#searchKeyword#),'%')
TRIM(DOCUMENT_DC) LIKE CONCAT('%',TRIM(#searchKeyword#),'%')
TRIM(PROCS_STEP_DV) = TRIM(#searchProcsStepDv#)
TRIM(DOCUMENT_SE) = TRIM(#searchDocumentSe#)
GROUP BY DOCUMENT_ID ) A

SELECT CODE AS DOCUMENT_SE, CODE_NM AS DOCUMENT_SE_NAME FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE USE_AT = 'Y'
AND CODE_ID = ''
AND CODE_ID = 'OE1010' AND CODE LIKE CONCAT(trim(#searchProcsStepDv#),'%')
ORDER BY CODE_NM
SELECT date_format(FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM , DOCUMENT_NM , CHGHY , ATCH_FILE_ID FROM OE1TNDOC WHERE DOCUMENT_ID = #documentId# ORDER BY DOCUMENT_ID DESC, DOC_NO ASC
